official_title: A bill to change the name of Clayton Lake which is an element of the flood control project for the Clayton and Tuskahoma Reservoirs, Kiamichi River, Oklahoma, to Sardis Lake.

summary.text: Renames Clayton Lake, Oklahoma, being constructed as part of the flood control project for the Clayton and Tuskahoma Reservoirs, as Sardis Lake.

titles.title: A bill to change the name of Clayton Lake which is an element of the flood control project for the Clayton and Tuskahoma Reservoirs, Kiamichi River, Oklahoma, to Sardis Lake.
